suppress.notes: This is for a vulnerability in org.apache.karaf.jaas.boot-4.2.1 coming in through the DDF security-core-api artifact. This is not an issue for replication because we are not running karaf.
geronimo-javamail_1.4_mail-1.8.4.jar vulnerability coming through ddf-security-common artifact. Currently suppressed in DDF. There doesn't appear to be any use of the javamail library in DDF.
These CVEs apply to the Eclipse IDE. OWASP flagged it because eclipse is in the group id. pax-url-aether-2.5.2.jar/META-INF/maven/org.eclipse.aether/aether-spi/pom.xml

These are jackson-databind issues coming in through DDF CXF dependencies. These are all related to json deserialization. Replication doesn't currently expose any endpoint through which an attacker could send the attack messages.
External Entity (XXE) vulnerability in jaxb-impl processing. This is not an issue as there is no endpoint an attacker could send the xml message to.
This is a guava 20.0 AtomicDoubleArray deserialization issue pulled in through DDF security dependencies. The DDF libraries do not appear to use the AtomicDoubleArray so this isn't an issue.
